snippet: No one claimed responsibility for the attack at a crowded bus station that bore the hallmarks of the Islamist insurgent group Boko Haram.
abstract: Female suicide bomber strikes bus station in Damaturu, Nigeria, killing 10 people and injuring 30; no group claims responsibility for attack, though Boko Haram is suspected.
lead_paragraph: No one claimed responsibility for the attack at a crowded bus station that bore the hallmarks of the Islamist insurgent group Boko Haram.

headline.main: Female Suicide Bomber Kills 10 in a Nigerian Region Racked by Islamist Violence
headline.print_headline: Female Suicide Bomber Kills 10 in a Nigerian Region Racked by Islamist Violence
